programme.title: Mscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um heri mascarado.

programme.title: Obsesso Fatal, (1992, Thriller)

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Adventure)

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999, Adventure)

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Um Tira da Pesada 3, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Justia Cega, (1990, Drama)

programme.title: Submisso, (2019, Inspirational Drama)

programme.title: Temporada de Furaces, (2009, Inspirational Drama)

programme.title: Dreamgirls: Em Busca de um Sonho, (2006, Drama)

programme.title: De Volta ao Fundo do Mar, (1970, Drama)

programme.title: O Rei da Montanha, (1970, Drama)

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma me solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mtica, um elfo, vive no apartamento h sculos. Os novos donos da casa precisam fazer amizade com a criatura, cuja tarefa justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Relaes de Famlia, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um homem que se sente enterrado sob uma montanha de dvidas cria uma ligao inesperada com um jovem em uma agncia de cobrana enquanto ambos lutam para se libertar de dvidas, tanto financeiras quanto emocionais.

programme.title: Ma ma, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps ser diagnosticada com cncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grvida. Alm de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera.

programme.title: Doentes de Amor, (1970, Drama)

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: H uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak no pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vo procurar uma pista diferente.

programme.title: Giorno e Mista chegam a Veneza para recuperar o disquete, mas so impedidos pelo Stand White Ice de Ghiaccio, que congela tudo.

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irm de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano 1938. Em uma runa mexicana, diversas mscaras de pedra so descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro aps trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso no d certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo luz do sol para se salvar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: H muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destrudo pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, j que o local era seu lar. Kong est decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Esprito de Vingana, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Nove anos aps se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldio e deix-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitria, at ser obrigado a entrar em ao novamente.

programme.title: O Retorno do Drago - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelar o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido est localizado, a regio de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Clockstoppers: O Filme, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Zak Gibbs (Jesse Bradford, "Hackers") um adolescente normal que consegue poderes extraordinrios aps encontrar um relgio misterioso que pode parar o tempo!

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O aventureiro Jack Hunter sai em busca de uma tumba lendria, encontrando perigosos velhos adversrios e ainda mais perigosas velhas chamas ao longo do caminho.

programme.title: Pequenos Espies 4, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Marisa Cortez Wilson casada com Wilbur, um reprter conhecido por desmascarar espies, e com ele tem um beb e duas crianas. O que o marido no sabe que a esposa uma ex-espi, que decidiu largar a carreira para se dedicar famlia.

programme.title: Misso Quase Impossvel, (2010, Late Night Comedies)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espio Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difcil at hoje: cuidar dos trs filhos de sua namorada, que no gostaram muito do namorado de sua me.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Callum Lynch explora as memrias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templrios.

programme.title: Tudo Pela Honra, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: O habilidoso espadachim e mulherengo Fanfan La Tulipe obrigado a se juntar ao exrcito do rei Lus XV pela trambiqueira Adeline La Franchise , que o convence dizendo que assim se casar com uma das filhas do rei.

programme.title: A Bruxa do Cabelo Branco do Reino Lunar, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Histria de dois amantes, a bruxa de cabelos brancos e o lder taosta Zhuo Yihang e seu amor que pode mudar o destino da nao.

programme.title: Honra, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficaro do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos comearem.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Co de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingana, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeo de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporao multibilionria, se junta a uma informante da polcia, para investigar a morte de seu irmo assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingana do drago, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendrio lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmo de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingana.

programme.title: The Children's Hour: The Children's Hour, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: In this provocatively daring film, an attention-seeking schoolgirl vengefully spreads rumors that her teachers (Audrey Hepburn and Shirley MacLaine) are lesbians.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Adventure)
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Legends Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Ernest Borgnine and Janet Leigh dazzle in this epic chronicle of brutal rivalry and bloodthirsty ambition as two brothers are locked in a battle that will decide their fate...and that of a beautiful princess.

programme.title: The Buccaneer, (1958, Action)
programme.desc: General Andrew Jackson's dependence on the help of pirate Jean Lafitte to repel the British is complicated by the Governor's daughter. Set in New Orleans during the War of 1812.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep, (1958, War)
programme.desc: The legendary Clark Gable and Burt Lancaster star in this gripping, classic military drama as a submarine commander (Gable) drives his men and his 1st officer (Lancaster) to the brink of mutiny in his quest to sink an enemy sub. Robert Wise directs.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat, (1959, Comedy)
programme.desc: A submarine captain and his supply officer are determined to get their dry-dock sub back into WWII action. However, a bevy of nurses comes aboard, causing hijinks in the hot pink sub.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryans act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Let Me In, (2011, Vampires)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chlo Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: "The Ruins" follows a group of friends who become entangled in a struggle for survival after visiting a remote archaeological dig in the Mexican jungle where they discover something deadly living among the ruins.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Catacombs, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Horror unfolds when a nave American makes her first trip to Paris and is invited to an underground rave party in the city's catacombs.

programme.title: Prey, (2007, Adventure)
programme.desc: While on holiday, an Amerian family are trapped by hungry lions in South Africa.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: "The Ruins" follows a group of friends who become entangled in a struggle for survival after visiting a remote archaeological dig in the Mexican jungle where they discover something deadly living among the ruins.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Lisa Lisa paints a picture of honor when she reveals Caesars tragic past to Joseph. Meanwhile, in the face of certain danger, Caesar enters into a solitary battle to avenge his father.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Inside a shadowy St. Moritz hotel, danger leaves Joseph and Lisa Lisa no time to mourn as they follow a bloody trail to Wamuu and Kars. Luckily, Lisa Lisa manages to strike a dealbut, of course, with one condition.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Joseph and Wamuu finally face off in an equestrian one-on-one. But will Josephs adroit attacks and weapon-grasping prowess be enough to keep Wamuus millennia-old pride in check?

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Warrior of Wind
programme.desc: When the battle between Wamuu and Joseph comes to a head, the surprising confessions arent far behind. Now the final hour has come for Lisa Lisa and Karsa fighter very different from his fellow Pillar Men.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Ties that Bind JoJo
programme.desc: With Lisa Lisas life on the line, Joseph must deceive the deceiver. Joining Joseph, Stroheim and Speedwagon arrive at the battlefield, where a family tragedy threatens to doom the world to a hopeless future.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Birth of a Superbeing
programme.desc: Having seized the Red Stone and the mask, Kars has become the Ultimate Being. Now the seemingly invincible entity has his sights solely on Joseph who, fleeing, has one final trick up his sleeve.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Ascendant One
programme.desc: Deep within a volcanos molten lava, Kars contemplates a comeback. But with the Red Stones power unleashed, both warriors are launched into the stratosphere of the unknown.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
programme.desc: Japan, 1987. Jotaro Kujo, a descendant of the Joestar family, is in prison and claims he is being possessed by an evil spirit. His grandfather, Joseph Joestar, immediately departs for Japan, where he must reveal the family's terrible secret.
programme.sub-title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit

programme.title: Akamaru is injured by a rival shinobi from another nation. The shinobi used a battle skill that spreads bacteria throughout the opponent's body, infecting the victim's mental faculties. This causes Akamaru to go into uncontrollable rampage!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn't the legendary being known as the "Onbaa."
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Shino are given a mission to provide security during the Kagetsu family funeral, but they soon realize that the real mission is to help the eldest son carry out the man's unusual last will and testament!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An ominous black smoke appears over the Land of Greens, and all of sudden Choji and company are attacked by an unidentified Ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While questioning Yurinoshin and Shun, the Hidden Leaf squad learns the truth about Shun's true identity.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are attacked by Ruiga, the first evil ninja, who can draw water from the earth to use as weapons.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is again attacked by the second evil ninja, Jiga. Jiga threatens Naruto's life when Hinata rushes in to save Naruto, but Hinata resists the threats and begins to fight!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Haruna are confronted by Renga. Declaring that he has taken down others before them, he advances on Naruto, ordering him to hand over the princess!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The princess has gained weight due to nerves and wants Ino to pose as the princess in order to attend the first meeting with a prince she adores.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee opens a dojo because he feels like he isn't keeping up with his training. He is hoping challengers will come to his dojo to face him in battle.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The first lady of the Land of Honey and her entourage have disappeared. Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are sent on a mission and they discover an eerie castle looming in the middle of the road!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: During Lee's medical check-up, he discovers that there's a lot of damage in his chakra network. Guy tries to cheer him up by taking Lee to the Academy training hall.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Seeking revenge for his dead father, Genho, Yagura's true identity and oldest sibling of the Ryudoin Brothers confronts Guy using a unique Jutsu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The ANBU Black Ops suspect that Genno, a carpenter of Hidden Leaf Village, stole important blueprints of the village. Tsunade concludes that the one who used Genno plans to attack the Village and puts the village on Super S-Rank Alert!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Fresh, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid named Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. He defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Bernie, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician (Jack Black, "School of Rock") strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, who soon becomes controlling.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Desperado, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: This sexy sequel to EL MARIACHI follows a mysterious guitar player (Antonio Banderas) as he seeks vengeance against the men who murdered his girlfriend.

programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: Major League II, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

programme.title: Major League: Back to the Minors, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Minor league pitcher Gus Cantrell is given the opportunity to manage the South Carolina Buzz. The ailing baseball team is full of a wacky lineup of terrible players, but owner Roger Dorn is banking on Cantrell to make a top-notch franchise out of them.

programme.title: A League of Their Own, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jimmy Dugan, a washed-up ballplayer whose big league days are over, is hired to coach in the All-American Girls Baseball League of 1943, while the male pros are at war.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman hes wanted all along!

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman magnificently captures the complexities and contradictions of the legendary comedian Lenny Bruce's mercurial character.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Taxi Driver, (1976, Crime)
programme.desc: Paul Schrader's gritty screenplay depicts the ever-deepening alienation of Vietnam Veteran Travis Bickle (Robert De Niro in a tour de force performance), a psychotic cab driver who obsessively cruises the mean streets of Manhattan.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zorro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EXPLOSIVE SITUATION! LUFFY VS. FAKE LUFFY!

programme.title: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HAS SET OUT! THE STRAW HATS IN DANGER!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky's new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BIG GUNS ASSEMBLED! THE DANGER OF THE FAKE STRAW HATS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! SHOW THEM WHAT YOU GOT FROM TRAINING!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they'll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they've made in the last two years!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE TOGETHER! LUFFY, SETTING OUT FOR THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING FACT! THE MAN WHO GUARDED THE SUNNY!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are attacked by a rival gang of pirates, but that may be the least of their worries. Luffy and his crew are on a collision course with a cantankerous Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY COMBAT UNDER THE SEA! THE DEMON OF THE OCEAN STRIKES!

programme.title: After their quarrel with the Kraken, the Straw Hats find themselves in hot water as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji turn up missing, and the rest of the crew runs short on air!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOST IN THE DEEP SEA! THE STRAW HATS GET SEPARATED!

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from a friend, Luffy saves his mates from a ghost ship captained by a deranged Dutchman! Unfortunately, their happy reunion is cut short by a volcanic eruption! Can the Hats take the heat?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNDERSEA VOLCANIC ERUPTION! DRIFTING TO THE FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally make it to Fish-Man Island, but their reputation precedes them, leading to trouble with the New Fish-Man Pirates! Only a daring maneuver can get them out of hot water, but there's no guarantee they'll survive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE FISHMAN ISLAND! BEAUTIFUL MERMAIDS!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXCITEMENT BLOW-OUT! SANJI'S LIFE UNDER THREAT!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FISHMAN ISLAND WILL BE ANNIHILATED?! SHARLEY'S PROPHECY!

programme.title: After two generous donors save Sanji from death by nosebleed, Luffy and Usopp take a tour of the island. But their welcome is worn out when a mystic mermaid has a terrifying visionthat Fish-Man Island will be destroyed at the hands of a Straw Hat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KING OF THE FISHMAN ISLAND! NEPTUNE, THE GOD OF THE SEA!

programme.title: After reuniting with Nami, Luffy and the gang are invited to the royal palace of Neptune, god of the sea! Meanwhile, the New Fish-Man Pirates exploit the power of a designer steroid in order to terrorize humans!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE! TAKEN BY THE SHARK THAT THEY SAVED!

programme.title: A trio of unsuspecting mermaids find themselves in hot water after releasing a bad guy from his barrel of a prison. Over at the royal palace, Luffy gets up close and personal with the Mermaid Princess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A COWARD AND A CRYBABY! THE PRINCESS IN THE HARD SHELL TOWER!

programme.title: Luffy's lightning reflexes spare the Mermaid Princess from a grisly death, Neptune's army attempts to apprehend the Straw Hats, and Captain Vander Decken forges a sinister undersea alliance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT'S AN EMERGENCY! THE RYUGU PALACE IS OCCUPIED!

programme.title: With their backs against the wall, the Straw Hats are forced to take King Neptune and his men hostage. On the other side of the palace, Luffy and the Mermaid Princess make plans to visit the Sea Forrest!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE IN SHOCK! THE KIDNAPPING OF SHIRAHOSHI!

programme.title: Luffy accidentally "kidnaps" the Mermaid Princess, an old friend issues a grave warning to Chopper and Sanji, and the New Fish-Man Pirates prepare for a raid on Ryugu Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HORDY'S ONSLAUGHT! THE RETALIATORY PLAN SET INTO MOTION!

programme.title: Captain Vander Decken and Hordy Jones manage to successfully breach the defenses of Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, Jimbei waits patiently for Luffy to arrive at the Sea Forest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IN RYUGU PALACE! ZORO VS. HORDY!

programme.title: Robin ventures into the forest in search of ancient secrets, Zoro takes to the water for a slicing, dicing showdown with Hordy Jones, and Luffy is branded a royal kidnapper by an angry mob of fish folk!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KEEP SHIRAHOSHI SAFE! DECKEN CLOSE BEHIND!

programme.title: Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS DEFEATED?! HORDY GAINS CONTROL OF THE RYUGU PALACE!

programme.title: Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they're no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE HAUNTING TIES! NAMI AND THE FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A HERO WHO FREED THE SLAVES! AN ADVENTURER TIGER!

programme.title: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime's fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KIZARU APPEARS! A TRAP TO CATCH TIGER!

programme.title: Arlong's violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper

programme.title: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DEATH OF THE HERO! A SHOCKING TRUTH OF TIGER!

programme.title: In the wake of Fisher Tiger's tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime's ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SUN PIRATES SPLIT! JIMBEI VS. ARLONG!

programme.title: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHAKING FISHMAN ISLAND! A CELESTIAL DRAGON DRIFTS IN!

programme.title: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen's mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SUDDEN TRAGEDY! A GUNSHOT SHUTS DOWN THE FUTURE!

programme.title: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO THE PRESENT! HORDY MAKES A MOVE!

programme.title: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KINGDOM IN SHOCK! AN ORDER TO EXECUTE NEPTUNE ISSUED!

programme.title: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy's uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out-of-body experience with hopes of saving his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A RIFT OPENS UP! LUFFY VS. JIMBEI!

programme.title: Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SOMETHING HAS HAPPENED TO HORDY! THE TRUE POWER OF THE EVIL DRUG!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Outlander, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A man from another world crash lands on Earth during the age of the Vikings.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: McCrae and Wood's cattle drive faces deadly situations. Sheriff July Johnson heads to Texas, and former prostitute Lorena is abandoned by Jake and kidnapped by the psychotic Blue Duck.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)

programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Plains

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: The cattle drive reaches Nebraska, where Gus and Clara reunite. Drought and Indian attacks take their toll as the drive reaches Montana, and Gus is wounded. Call honors his best friend's request.

programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: A Difcil Vingana
programme.desc: Depois que seu pai assassinado, John Mason est disposto a dar a volta ao mundo para encontrar o homem responsvel. O que ele no sabe que o assassino pode estar em sua prpria casa.

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras
programme.desc: Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Show de Vizinha
programme.desc: Um estudante do ensino mdio se apaixona por sua vizinha, e descobre que ela uma atriz porn.

programme.title: Sr. & Sra. Smith
programme.desc: Um casal entediado fica surpreso ao descobrir que ambos so assassinos contratados por agncias rivais para se matarem.

programme.title: O ltimo Heri
programme.desc: Quando jovem, Andrey Rodin fez parte de um programa secreto de treinamento de espies. Vinte anos depois, ele vive em paz at que seu pai, um ex-agente do governo quem Andrey pensava j estar morto, pede ajuda, o levando a aceitar uma misso.

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal
programme.desc: O ladro realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psictico, Temple. O plano corre bem at que o ladro descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grvida de Temple, Mia.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agncia de Proteo Ambiental da Ucrnia, de Marselha a Odessa, alm de dois sacos de contedo suspeito.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh
programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: O Grito
programme.desc: Karen uma enfermeira americana que vive em Tquio e exposta a uma misteriosa maldio sobrenatural: um esprito vingativo que possui uma pessoa com uma raiva poderosa antes de reivindicar sua vida e se espalhar para outra vtima.

programme.title: O Grito 2
programme.desc: Com Amber Tamblyn e Arielle Kebbel. Em Tquio, a irm de uma garota previamente morta por uma maldio maligna acidentalmente infligida a si mesma. Com a ajuda de um jornalista, ela deve aprender como impedi-lo de uma vez por todas.

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Imagens do Alm
programme.desc: Um casal descobre uma presena perturbadora nas fotos de um suposto acidente.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano II
programme.desc: A histria se passa quase 15 anos aps os acontecimentos de Psicopata Americano, acompanhando a nica sobrevivente de Patrick Bateman. Ela se torna assistente de um professor e comea a desenvolver obsesses assassinas, destruindo quem cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Fora de Alcance
programme.desc: Madec, um empresrio internacional sem escrpulos, contrata o habilidoso jovem rastreador, Ben, para gui-lo pelo rido deserto de Mojave durante uma viagem de caa.

programme.title: Assassinatos em Boston
programme.desc: Matt Sorenson um ex-boxeador que tambm policial. Ele tenta elucidar a brutal morte de seu irmo mais novo, Michael, e para isto precisa se infiltrar em algo desconhecido para ele: a prtica do sadomasoquismo.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Vingana sem Limites
programme.desc: Quando Sandy, uma prostituta de luxo encontrada morta, seu protetor Jake fica inconformado e s pensa em vingana. Ele a amava, e agora ele no vai sossegar enquanto no encontrar seu assassino.

programme.title: O Corvo III: A Salvao
programme.desc: Alex Corvis um jovem injustamente condenado cadeira eltrica pelo brutal assassinato de Lauren, sua namorada. Pelo poder mgico do corvo, Corvis retorna do mundo dos mortos para vingar a morte de Lauren e limpar seu nome.

programme.title: Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresrio e um detetive da polcia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho justia.

programme.title: O Ataque Dos Dinossauros

programme.desc: Encorajado pelo av, Spence tenta aprender a lidar com seus medos e a fazer novos amigos em um acampamento cristo.

programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.desc: Espen Ash Lad, filho de um pobre agricultor, embarca em uma misso perigosa com seus irmos para salvar a princesa de um vilo conhecido como o Rei da Montanha. O objetivo ganhar uma recompensa e salvar a fazenda da sua famlia da runa.

programme.title: Para derrotar RX, a Chefe da Tribo Demonaca, av de Maribaron, a Feiticeira Kaima Medusa dos 100 Olhos, desperta depois de um longo sono de 100 anos. A vida de Kyoko e de seus amigos est prestes a ser tomada pelo poder dos olhos da Medusa.

programme.desc: South Park - S8E14

programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem! - S1E46

programme.title: Hinata enfrenta Neji, mas ele ataca o ponto de presso dela com Byakugan (olhos brancos). O fluxo de chakra de Hinata para, e ela quase perde a conscincia. Ela encontra coragem ao lembrar como Naruto no desiste de nenhuma dificuldade.
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna - S1E47

programme.title: No nono combate, Gaara finalmente aparece e seu oponente Lee, um especialista em taijutsu (tcnica fsica). Lee usa esta poderosa tcnica contra Gaara, que manipula areia de sua cabaa. Ento, a Armadura de Areia de Gaara finalmente se solta...
programme.desc: Naruto: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode - S1E48

programme.title: Lee usa a tcnica banida, Ltus Primria, para atacar Gaara. A luta parece ter terminado, mas a manobra apenas danifica a proteo feita pela areia de Gaara. Imvel aps de ter usado Ltus Primria, Lee lanado facilmente por toda parte por Gaara.

programme.title: Lee decide usar a manobra proibida, Ltus Oculta, que libera trs ou mais dos oito portais que possuem a concentrao dos pontos de chakra. Quando os oito portais se abrem, o usurio pode morrer. Mas Gaara responde com seu prprio ataque, Atade de Areia.

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E20

programme.title: Yugi e Joey liberam cada um o seu monstro mais forte, Caveira Invocada e Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos, mas a fora deles perde a imponncia, comparada ao tremendo poder do Guardio do Porto.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E21

programme.title: Depois de derrotar por pouco o All Starz no Torneio Americano, Kenny decide que ele deve registrar um banco de dados dos pontos altos e baixos dos BladeBreakers desde o incio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E29

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E31

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E33

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E34

programme.title: No querendo deixar sua derrota inicial para Enrique o perturbar, Tyson fica ocupado refazendo seu Beyblade. Com Enrique duvidando de sua prpria tcnica, e Oliver visitando-o da Frana em Roma, o cenrio est pronto para uma revanche.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E36

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E37

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E49

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, comea a se mover com o poder da Jia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a mmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E23

programme.title: Sango convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrs. Kuranosuke tem aparncia, status e riqueza. Sango est confusa sobre como ela recusar sua proposta de casamento.

programme.title: Narak est tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak v que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E27

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E2

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E3

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E4

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E10

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E11

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E12

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E15

programme.title: The Usual Suspects (1995)
programme.desc: A detective (Chazz Palminteri) questions a con man about his relationships with assorted criminals (Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne) and their link to a ship explosion.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls (1997)
programme.desc: After escaping from a serial killer, a doctor (Ashley Judd) helps police and a forensic psychologist (Morgan Freeman) track the madman.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: Vicious (2025)
programme.desc: A strange ritual soon unravels into a waking nightmare when a woman receives a mysterious box that comes with instructions to place three things inside: something you need, something you hate, and something you love.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers (2006)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: Dexter races to find the missing kidnapped child before its too late; Deb visits her godfather in the hospital and rethinks her future; Harry comes face-to-face with a serial killer.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: Uncommon Valor (1983)
programme.desc: A colonel with a sponsor leads five Marine veterans into Laos to find his son and others missing in action.

programme.title: World Trade Center (2006)
programme.desc: Two Port Authority officers become trapped in the rubble of the World Trade Center after going in to help people escape from the buildings during the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: Valkyrie (2008)
programme.desc: Fearing that Hitler will destroy his beloved Germany, Col. Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) joins a group of high-ranking men who are plotting to assassinate him.

programme.title: Slingshot (2024)
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.title: First Shift (2024)
programme.desc: A veteran police officer and his rookie partner face adrenaline-fueled pursuits and unexpected threats as they navigate the mean streets of New York City.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train (2016)
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her divorce, spends her commute fantasizing about the couple that lives in a house that her train passes. One morning, she sees something shocking and becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation.

programme.title: Valkyrie (2008)
programme.desc: Fearing that Hitler will destroy his beloved Germany, Col. Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) joins a group of high-ranking men who are plotting to assassinate him.

programme.title: Proud Mary (2018)
programme.desc: Mary is a professional assassin who works for a ruthless gangster and his organized crime family in Boston. Her desire to save a 12-year-old boy from the streets soon causes an all-out turf war that forces her to take down whoever stands in her way.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Night Clerk (2020)
programme.desc: A hotel clerk becomes the prime suspect when a woman is murdered during his shift. As the police investigation closes in, he makes a personal connection with a guest -- but soon realizes he must stop the killer before she becomes the next victim.

programme.title: The Riot Club (2014)
programme.desc: Two first-year students (Sam Claflin, Max Irons) at Oxford University join a secret society and learn that their reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of one evening.

programme.title: Ride (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to raise money for his daughters cancer treatment, a retired bull rider teams up with his estranged son to orchestrate a robbery. However, they must soon outwit the local police if they want to keep the cash and their freedom.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: The Last Gunfight (2025)
programme.desc: As the worlds top assassins fight to the death in a ruthless underground tournament, a rogue crew has its own deadly agenda: survive the carnage, outplay the killers and take down the mastermind behind it all.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Cloverfield (2008)
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Becky (2020)
